Name: The Albino Moray attacks!
Description: "Pale and savage as a wolf-moon; toothed to rival the greatest of whales; and quick to take offence. Don't tease the beast. You'll be lucky to lose a leg."

DefaultEvent.Name: A bad end
DefaultEvent.Description: You fling your least-disciplined zailor overboard. The Moray wolfs him down and turns its blank and greedy eye back to you - but you've won a few moments grace. Your crew, it is fair to say, are not impressed. Well, perhaps they'll be next.

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: It's nimbler than you are. But perhaps you can distract it with a zailor. Your crew won't like this, though -

DefaultEvent.Name: Too late!
DefaultEvent.Description: You scrape a sudden reef - veer - slow - and it's upon you!

ChildBranches.Name: Flee!
ChildBranches.Description: Corkscrew in sudden circles. Confuse it. Escape.
